content.rendered:
SWU (Srinakharinwirot University) has become a hub for learning, research, and cultural exchange. From its roots as a teacher training college, it has expanded its academic offerings to encompass a wide array of disciplines, including the arts and humanities, natural and social sciences, health sciences, technology, and business administration. The venue will be organized at the Prasarnmit campus of SWU where is located at the center of Bangkok and easily access from public transport including bus and metro.

The venue and surrounding building in Srinakharinwirot University
